attributes.action: demand councils to collect garbage weekly for health reasons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this environment of health conscious times, and hospital cut-backs. Shouldnt all councils be making sure Everyones household refuse bin is emptied WEEKLY? Leaving smelly refuse out to fester in higher temperaturs during summer is deplorable. it encourages vermin, which we know are on the increase. it encourages new strains of 'bugs', which seem incurable without great expense in costly medications.we can all stay healthier, and be less of a drain on N.Health costs if we can keep our environment clean and disease free. We just need councils to clear away our rubbish, and this problem is half solved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
